org.restlet.component
Class DefaultRestletServer

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.component.DefaultRestletServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, OriginServer, RestletServer, Element, UniformInterface
public class DefaultRestletServer
extends Object
implements RestletServer

Default restlet server that can be easily subclassed.
